name: places/ChIJaQ_NnH1ZwokRrTbKKKIiFg0
formattedAddress: 47 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 47 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014-4043, USA

originalText.text: Had the chance ro check out the Holly Jolly Bar this year and I enjoyed it. Definitely worth a visit during the Holidays for cute photo ops and drinks to match.

text.text: Had the chance ro check out the Holly Jolly Bar this year and I enjoyed it. Definitely worth a visit during the Holidays for cute photo ops and drinks to match.

originalText.text:
Nope don't go. It's not worth it. You pay $22 online for drinks but when you go there you see the drinks are $18. Service is terrible. The service staff are wearing sweatpants. I couldn't finish my drink... it was obvious after an hour that I took 2 sips and no one cared or asked of everything was alright. There is absolutely nothing special about this. Don't go... its a waste of money. The place is a normal bar with extra Christmas decorations. My old fashion was just in a happy holidays cup and that's it.

Please don't go

originalText.text: Everything was barely average. It had cute Christmas decor, but thatâ€™s it. Itâ€™s certainly not worth coming back for it. My boyfriend and I arrived at 12:45 for a 1PM reservation. There was one more group of two waiting. The hostess said wait just 10 minutes and we could all be seated. Ok, no big deal. 20 minutes go by, and the place is packed full of people for the 1PM reservation. The hostess was seating all these people who came in late, completely forgetting us and that first group. Like, hello??? We were here first!!! Split some big tables into small ones to seat us! She had no idea what she was doing and, what I assumed to be the manager, had to come over and help her. Even still, we had shout out to seat us for them to even look our way. Ridiculous. When we got to our table, we ordered our food and drinks. I had the avocado toast and eggs with an espresso martini. My boyfriend got another espresso martini and the chicken and waffles. They were tasty, not the best brunch Iâ€™ve had though. Our waitress kept pushing the bottomless drinks though, which we kept having to say we didnâ€™t want because it was an extra $25/person. It was very annoying. My boyfriend just got a second cocktail which he paid for, since brunch is included in the ticket price. The food was alright, the atmosphere is great, but the service is abysmal, and that was a serious mood killer.

originalText.text: Eunan was an amazing bartender!!  The whole place was so fun & festive-  drinks were great!

text.text: Eunan was an amazing bartender!!  The whole place was so fun & festive-  drinks were great!

originalText.text:
I'm honestly upset at even stepping foot in this place, I came cause my friend saw it hyped on Instagram so we decided to come for my birthday but when we came it was kinda empty and the people that were sitting next to me were not the vibe lol. Not very holly jolly of them tbh ðŸ˜‚
I'll mention the 3 of my friends were Latina and the people around us weren't. We weren't dressed up just like a lot of the clientele so I don't think it was our clothing.
